titles.title: Electing officers of the House of Representatives.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 129.

DIVISION OF THE QUESTION - Mr. Ehlers demanded that the question of adoption be divided. Without objection, the question was divided and the Chair put the question on adoption of each portion of the resolution.
On agreeing to the portion of the resolution electing the Clerk Agreed to by voice vote.
On agreeing to the portion of the resolution electing the CAO Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/6/2007--Passed House without amendment. Elects the following officers of the House of Representatives: (1) Lorraine C. Miller as the Clerk; and (2) Daniel P. Beard as Chief Administrative Officer.
